SEARCH
Package dms.util

Class CSVImporter

java.lang.Object
dms.util.CSVImporter
public class CSVImporter extends Object
Irene Duett, CEN 3024c, 11/12/2025 The CSVImporter class provides functionality to import DVD data from a CSV (Comma-Separated Values) file into the systemâ€™s DVDCollection.

Each line in the CSV file is expected to represent a single DVD record with six attributes in the following order: ID, Title, Director, Release Year, Genre, Rating.

Invalid or improperly formatted lines are skipped automatically, and an informational message is displayed in the console for transparency.

Usage Example:

     DVDCollection collection = new DVDCollection("db/dvds.db");
     int importedCount = CSVImporter.importFromCSV("data/dvds.csv", collection);
     System.out.println(importedCount + " DVDs successfully imported.");

  • Method Details

    • importFromCSV

      public static int importFromCSV(String filePath, DVDCollection collection)
      Imports DVD data from a CSV file into the specified DVDCollection.

      The method reads each line, splits it by commas, validates the data, constructs a DVD object, and adds it to the collection. Lines that are missing fields or contain invalid data are skipped.

      Parameters:
      filePath - the full path to the CSV file to be imported
      collection - the DVDCollection where the DVDs will be stored
      Returns:
      the number of DVDs successfully added to the collection
